short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple dice rolling extension for Google Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Dice is a simple dice rolling extension for Google Chrome. Simply click the button and click a die to roll, wherever and whenever.

* Ad-free
* Works offline
* Very small (less than 0.1mb)
* No permissions and no data

V.1.1.0
